## IBuffered interface

Generic interface for types with binary backing buffers.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IBuffered<T> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [buffer](./api.ibuffered.buffer.md) | <code>T</code> | An implementation's publicly accessible backing array / ArrayBuffer (usually a typed array instance). |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [bytes()](./api.ibuffered.bytes.md) | Returns an Uint8Array view of backing array. |
